thread.title: McCarthy abruptly withdraws candidacy for House speaker
thread.title_full: McCarthy abruptly withdraws candidacy for House speaker

title: McCarthy abruptly withdraws candidacy for House speaker
text:
> Political McCarthy abruptly withdraws candidacy for House speaker Rep. Paul Ryan, R- Wis., arrives for a meeting on Capitol Hill in Washington, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, where Republicans were to nominate candidates to replace outgoing House Speaker John Boehner. In a stunning move, Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy withdrew his candidacy for House speaker Thursday, throwing Congress' Republican leadership into chaos. (AP Photo/Evan Vucci) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
